products.description: A powerful Android smartphone with a 6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED display and a 108MP camera.

products.description: A high-performance laptop with a 16-inch Retina display and up to 8-core Intel Core i9 processor.

products.description: A premium 2-in-1 laptop with a 14-inch OLED display and up to 11th Gen Intel Core i7 processor.

products.name: Sony PlayStation 5
products.description: A next-generation gaming console with lightning-fast loading times and ray-tracing graphics.

products.name: Xbox Series X
products.description: A powerful gaming console with 12 teraflops of processing power and support for 4K gaming.

products.name: Nintendo Switch
products.description: A hybrid gaming console that can be played on the go or on a TV.

products.name: Apple AirPods Pro
products.description: Wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation and customizable fit.

products.name: Bose QuietComfort 35 II
products.description: Noise-canceling headphones with Alexa voice control and up to 20 hours of battery life.

products.name: Dell XPS 13
products.description: The XPS 13 is a premium ultrabook with a 13.4-inch 16:10 display, 11th Gen Intel Core processors, and up to 16GB of RAM and 2TB of storage.

products.name: LG OLED CX
products.description: The OLED CX is a high-end 4K TV with a 120Hz refresh rate, HDMI 2.1, and support for Dolby Vision IQ and Dolby Atmos.
